Script.name: echoCargo
Script.script: --echoes cargo information to the cargo console function echoCargo() local cargo = gmcp.char.ship.cargo --this is a table, and possibly a table of tables clearWindow("FEDUI.cargoWindow") --reset the window, no need to have old cargo sticking around FEDUI.cargoWindow:cecho("Current Cargo:\n") for key, value in pairs(cargo) do FEDUI.cargoWindow:cecho(""..value.commodity) --name of the commodity FEDUI.cargoWindow:cecho(" at ") FEDUI.cargoWindow:echo(value.cost) --how much you paid for it FEDUI.cargoWindow:echo("/") FEDUI.cargoWindow:echo(value.base) --default price of commodity if value.base-value.cost >=0 then FEDUI.cargoWindow:cecho(" (+"..value.base-value.cost) --the amount under base price you paid else FEDUI.cargoWindow:cecho(" (-"..value.base-value.cost) --the amount over base price you paid end FEDUI.cargoWindow:cecho(") from ") FEDUI.cargoWindow:cecho(""..value.origin) --what planet you bought it from FEDUI.cargoWindow:cecho("\n") end FEDUI.cargoWindow:echo("\n") end --cargo table contents: --base = [number] --this the commodity's default price --commodity = [string] --this is the name of the commodity --cost = [number] --this is how much you paid for the commodity --origin = [string] --this is where the commodity came from
